00016 template <class T> unsigned int Node<T>::hasChildNode(T value)
00017 {
00018         // check T, caus for T = NodeOfTrees* we don't want to compare the pointers, but the objects
00019         if ( (string)typeid(value).name() == "P11NodeOfTrees")
00020         {
00021                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<childNodes.size(); i++)
00022                 {
00023                         if (*(NodeOfTrees*)childNodes[i]->value == *(NodeOfTrees*)value)
00024                                 return i;
00025                 }
00026         }
00027         else
00028         {
00029                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<childNodes.size(); i++)
00030                 {
00031                          if (childNodes[i]->value == value)
00032                                 return i;
00033                 }
00034         }
00035 
00036         // we did not found a node with the given value -> throw nodeDoesNotOccur exception
00037         throw (bool)1;
00038 }

00040 template <class T> Node<T>* Node<T>::insertChildNode(T value)
00041 {
00042         unsigned int pos;
00043         // search if a Node with the word already exists in childNodes (if there is one -> get its position)
00044         try 
00045         {
00046                 pos = this->hasChildNode(value);
00047         }
00048         catch (bool nodeDoesNotOccur)
00049         {
00050                 // node does not exist yet -> create it and return the new node
00051                 childNodes.push_back(new Node<T>(value));
00052                 return childNodes[childNodes.size()-1];
00053         }
00054         // node with the given value already exists -> increment count and return the node
00055         childNodes[pos]->count++;
00056         return childNodes[pos];
00057 }

00069 template <class T> Node<T>* Tree<T>::insert(vector<T> &values)
00070 {
00071         Node<T>* n = root;
00072         for (unsigned int i=0; i<values.size(); i++)
00073         {
00074                 n = n->insertChildNode(values[i]);
00075         }
00076         return n;
00077 }

00079 template <class T> void Tree<T>::insert(PhrasePair* p)
00080 {
00081         // transform src-words into src-NodeOfTrees
00082         vector<NodeOfTrees*> src;
00083         src.resize(p->src.size());
00084         for (unsigned int i=0; i<p->src.size(); i++)
00085         {
00086                 src[i] = new NodeOfTrees(p->src[i], new Tree<unsigned int>(0));
00087         }
00088 
00089         // insert/increment src-path
00090         Node<T>* lastNode = this->insert(src);
00091 
00092         // concat target-path to the src-paths-last-node
00093         lastNode->value->tree->insert(p->target);
00094 }
